divs: sighting detailsi recieved a cell phone call from a friend at around 9pm saturday, 2\27. not wanting to disturb my wife i went out to my front yard to talk with him, i was watching aircraft take off from sjc as i was talking to my friend when something caught my eye, at first i thought it was a plastic grocery bag caught in a "thermal" then thought it was a parachute flare that had gone out? then i watched this object change shape, like a square "sheet" to a teardrop then back. i told my friend what i was seeing, he thought it may hay have been a uav from lockheed\martin based out of moffatt field. i watched this "shape" making no sound moving from north to south at a slow speed, then make a left turn east and dissapear behind the treeline! i really had no idea what i was seeing, it was transparent almost translucent, making no sound, i had no idea what i was seeing. i don't know wheather this was ours or theirs? but i did see something and i don't know what it was?
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Santa Clara
There were no other sightings in Santa Clara on or around February 27th 2010
Summary: Changing square shape, no sound, approx. 400 ft elev. moving south
